sentences.en: A good man terminates a friendship with out rancour.
sentences.cn: 君子绝交不记仇.

sentences.en: a lifelong friendship
sentences.cn: 一生的友谊

sentences.en: An intimate friendship grew up between them.
sentences.cn: 他们之间渐渐产生了亲密的友情.

sentences.en: Certainly, pets can help children develop friendship skills.
sentences.cn: 宠物的确能够帮助孩子们培养交友技能。

sentences.en: For the sake of our friendship after years, do me this honour!
sentences.cn: 看在咱哥俩多年的情分上, 你就赏个面子吧!

sentences.en: Friendship means understanding, not agreement. It means forgiveness, not forgetting.It means the memories last, even if contact is lost.
sentences.cn: 友情是理解，不是妥协；是原谅，不是遗忘。即使不联系，感情依然在。

sentences.en: He and Bob struck up a friendship (= began to be friends ) .
sentences.cn: 他和鲍勃交了朋友。

sentences.en: He made a profession of friendship to his classmate Mary.
sentences.cn: 他向他的同学玛丽表白了他的友情.

sentences.en: her close friendship with her aunt
sentences.cn: 她与姑母的亲密友谊

sentences.en: His voice was warm with friendship and respect.
sentences.cn: 他的声音里充满了友善和敬意。

sentences.en: I could always rely on Gary for friendship and support.
sentences.cn: 我总是可以依靠加里的友情和支持。

sentences.en: I helped him purely and simply out of friendship.
sentences.cn: 我帮他纯粹是出于友情.

sentences.en: It's pointlessly trying to keep your friendship secret — it's common knowledge already.
sentences.cn: 你们无须将友情保密——其实已尽人皆知.

sentences.en: Li Ming says that he has the honour of my friendship.
sentences.cn: 李明说他很高兴与我交朋友.

sentences.en: The banquet was permeated with an atmosphere of friendship.
sentences.cn: 宴会充满友好气氛.

sentences.en: The two boys formed a deep and lasting friendship .
sentences.cn: 这两个男孩子建立了深厚持久的友谊。

sentences.en: Their friendship was turned to enmity through idle gossip.
sentences.cn: 无聊的闲言碎语使他们反目成仇.

sentences.en: They struck up a friendship on their tour of Egypt.
sentences.cn: 他们是在埃及游览时成为朋友的.

sentences.en: True friendship comes when the silence between two people is comfortable.--David Tyson Gentry
sentences.cn: 真正的友情是，即使两人不说话，也觉得很舒服。

sentences.en: We will never forget the friendship sealed in adversity.
sentences.cn: 患难之交永不忘.

phrases.tran_cn: 友谊型群体；友好群体；社交小组
